name: Frog and the box
description:
Controls

Arrows - move and interact with U.I

Enter - interact U.I 

R - reset the level

ESC - exit to the main menu 

Story 

This little froggy, has been captured by a malicious kid to prove his new toy, "The Box", now you must help this little froggy, to escape from "The Box", will you reach the exit?

Comments

This jam was interesting because I´ve never made a game so small and my principal problem was the level design, it took  a few hours to finally I can think outside of the box like the frog, but finally, I reached the goal to make a game on an 84x48 resolution, I hope to make a  better game in the next jam  

In the meantime, I hope you have a great year and that we can all grow as developers.
